resources.string: Enactus is an international non-profit organization that works with leaders in business and higher education to mobilize university students to make a difference in their communities while developing the skills to become socially responsible business leaders. It is working at the grass root level in the areas of Health, Education and Social Entrepreneurship to contribute back to the society which has given us so much. Holistic development of the society with the joint efforts of all the stakeholders is the cynosure of Enactus-MNNIT Allahabad. It is working with the leaders in Education and Corporate sectors along with the students to pull vulnerable families out of penury.
